video_prompt: Camera swoops through a cloud-suspended, cathedral-like kingdom. Stained glass windows shimmer with shifting light. Cherry blossoms drift along an ornate, curving staircase. A white bird soars past a towering mountain. Sparkles gently fall across a pastel sky, illuminating misty valleys and connecting bridges. The entire scene glows with a soft, dreamlike diffusion.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Ethereal cloud kingdom, grand cathedral of pearlescent stone with rainbow stained glass and glittering lights, elegant cherry blossom staircase leading to sky bridges, white bird soaring near dark mountains with distant fortress, pastel blue sky with sparkling adornments, soft luminous light, fantasy, dreamlike, peaceful, wondrous.
refined_video_prompt: The camera glides through the fantastical realm. Light actively shifts and shimmers across grand windows. Cherry blossoms gently drift along a winding path. A white bird soars past a colossal mountain. Glimmering sparkles descend through the pastel sky, dynamically illuminating misty valleys and connecting bridges below. The entire scene emanates a soft, dreamlike glow, subtly diffusing and brightening.
